The JMIERR Sweater is a stylish and comfortable option for fall. The beautiful knitting and eye-catching color make it a standout piece in my wardrobe. It’s a great sweater for moderate temperatures but would require layering in harsher winter conditions. Overall, a solid, fashionable choice for the fall season.

评论概述: It's a sweater in form and concept... that's about it
评论详情: I don’t know who is writing some of these reviews but the 4-5 Star people must have got something other than what I got. The material is far from what you think of when you think of a cable knit sweater. I think of New England fishermen with sweaters as thick as their beards. So, to my surprise what I got was something I can only describe as being on par with a stuffed animal you’d get at the State Fair. The material is very soft but its shimmery and just not what you’d expect of a men's sweater. As far as size goes it might as well be one size fits all, with its oversized fit and abundant stretchiness you could wrap a f’n boat for the winter in it.  The Suede elbow pads are just cloth backing or are sewn on backwards, either way if you plan on army crawling in the bad boys don’t be surprised if you blow the elbows out. To top it off it took 3 weeks to get here just for me to have to send it back on the slow boat it sailed in on.

This is a pretty solidly good sweater.  The material feels nice, and especially feels soft and nice inside, when you put it on.  It fits me pretty well and it definitely looks good.  My main negative here though is that there were some loose little threads up around the buttons and on the collar...which gives it a slightly more average look if you look closely there.  But I will just snip those off with little scizzors so no big deal.  But it makes me think it might have looser threads, so might happen again, or perhaps it won't be as durable, I am not sure.  But it definitely otherwise looks great, and feels great to wear.  I would definitely recommend it for a decent sweater with a good look, although for the most premium or most long term durable you might want to look to higher price points.

This men’s cable knit pullover sweater is a perfect blend of style and comfort. The stand collar with the 1/4 button design adds a nice touch, making it great for both casual and semi-formal settings. The cable knit pattern gives it a classic look while still feeling modern, and it pairs well with jeans or slacks.  The material is soft and comfortable to wear throughout the day, providing warmth without being overly bulky. The long sleeves fit well, and the sweater has a nice, tailored cut that isn’t too tight or too loose.  The fit is true to size.

I got this for my husband to wear to work when it gets cooler. I think I like it a lot more than he does! LOL! He’s not totally sold on the elbow patches even though I think it looks great on him. It is soft and stylish and it fits very well. I hope I can convince him to change his mind by the time the weather cools down.

So far I like this sweater.  The material is quite soft.  Although the material is not thin and should keep you warm on a fall day, it is not overly heavy.  The sweater looks nice and has a classic " fall" look.  The elbows has patches as an accent.  Not a big fan of the patches but the sweater looks nice.  I like the coller and the button up neck.  The mornings are just starting to get a bit cool so woth fall just around the corner, I plan on getting a lot of use out of this sweater.
This sweater looks and feels great. Super soft and fits well. Quality is high and my only complaint is that its made me realize I dont like elbow patches.
The material is so soft and vibrant. I can't wait to wear this this winter season. It's so sharp looking.

This is a handsome sweater that has some nostalgic professor vibes rocking through it.  I like the cut of it and the faux leather elbow pads add just the right amount of accent.  The fabric and stitching are about what you'd expect in this price range but the fit is much larger than the sizing chart suggests.  Definitely order a size smaller than usual.

This is a very nice looking, casual sweater. The button-up neck, stand collar, are a sharp design. The collar and elbows are accented with suede patches, but the suede is a little thin, so I don't know how they'll hold up with wear.  The sweater is of medium weight, warm and soft, made of 50% Viscose (a type of rayon fabric made from wood pulp), 28% Polyester, and 22% Polyamide. It fits to size.It's machine washable on cold, but hang dry or lay it flat to dry, because a dryer is not good for Viscose.  This is a very good value, and I highly recommend it.  Edit: I just got back from Edinburgh, Scotland (October 2024). In Scotland they say that "every day has four seasons," which is true, so the strategy is to dress in layers. This sweater was perfect for that, both in Edinburgh and an excursion to the Highlands. It's warm, but not stifling. And it's stylish enough to wear for that smart-casual look. It's my favorite sweater now.

This pullover cream sweater is perfect to kick off my fall season.  It is soft, comfortable, and breathable.  By being breathable, it will keep me warm but not too hot since I hate transitioning from outside to inside burning up.  The patchwork on the elbows makes this sweater look even nicer and also prevents it from being worn out.  My wife really liked how it looked on me as it will go well with my fall boots and loafers.  Lastly, the darker tan leather look at the button area helps me to look more dressed up.

I really like this sweater! It’s the first one I’ve gotten with patches on the elbows, but I think it classes up the sweater a good amount. The sweater is also very comfortable and will definitely keep you warm. I would say it’s a medium weight sweater and isn’t too hot where you couldn’t wear it indoors.  It fit me quite well and I am more slim fit for reference!

评论概述: SO SOFT! Sharp looking. Perfect fit
评论详情: I was immediately surprised with how incredibly soft this is! So soft and fits well on your shape. Doesn't feel suffocatingly warm, but keeps me cozy.  the collar liner and elbow pads are soft and flexible.  The actual tag on the sweater does say it's machine washable.  The fit is perfect for me and I'm excited for it to cool down more here so I can wear it all the time.
I gifted this beautiful pullover sweater as its fabric is very soft.It is very well stitched and is very elegant to wear.It is long sleeve and has collar buttons.A very perfect birthday gift.

评论概述: Upscale Classic Look, Very Soft, High Value for the Price and Style
评论详情: This is now my favorite sweater.  The suede patches on the elbows and neck are a style I've always admired, and they look especially good with the green color I ordered.  The fabric is extremely soft and comfortable, and the cable knit gives the sweater an appearance of being far more expensive than it actually is.This sweater is a great choice for fall weather over just an undershirt, or under an overcoat in the dead of winter.  I recommend it without reservation.

This would've been a five-star review. It's not.  The plus: The sweater is pretty. It's soft and stretchy and comfortable. It runs small. And since it's made of viscose, it will shrink in the dryer. You might want to order two sizes up.  But here was the hidden deal killer for me: Despite its comfiness, this thing was plagued by a hard, scratchy, sewn-in tag which grates at the back of your neck. If the sweater were made of regular woven fabric, it would be easy to remove.  But it's not. This is a stretchy knit. So while I was able to use a tiny seam-ripper to successfully remove one side of the tag, I couldn't on the other side. Which resulted in a tiny hole in the back of the collar. And that tiny hole instantly grew as it unraveled, to about a half-inch across, rendering the sweater unusable. It's in my trash can.  So if you can endure a scratchy tag, it's great. Otherwise, be warned by my sorry experience with this thing.

This is a heavy sweater good for the winter months and it not only fits well it is soft and looks great! Using and undershirt gives this sweater a nice "pop". It is a very nice sweater and will make you feel warm and comfortable, highly recommended!!!

This is one nice looking sweater that I use for work.  It is somewhat thick but still breathable.  The collar around the neck is very comfortable and can easily fold over.  With the price including the discount option, this is a very well priced and comfortable sweater that I can highly recommend.

This 50% Viscose fabric is really soft and comfortable on the skin, I like the feel of it a lot, no skin irritation. It's not too thick, I would say it's medium thick but breathable to wear, and not too heavy either. It looks a little big when opening the package but it fits me well with my regular size L. The ribbed cuffs and waistband feel just fine also, not too tight or stuffy. My favorite part of this pullover is the stand-up collar with large button closures and the Tan Suede patches. They stood out well with the Black Pullover, a great combo. As far as cleaning, it is recommended to handwash with mild detergent. It shouldn't be too hard since this fabric is really soft and easy to handle. One of my favorite sweaters so far, great style, warm and comfortable to wear.

First thing I noticed about this is how soft it was. Very pleasantly surprised. It fits true to size. I love the little details that make it a bit nicer than a plain old sweater such as the pads on the elbows and the buttons at the top. Would be perfect with jeans or dress pants to wear to something like church or dinner out. Seems like good quality and very comfortable.
